metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3593 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An invalid pointer initialization issue was found in the SLiRP networkingimplementation of QEMU. The flaw exists in the udp6_input() function andcould occur while processing a udp packet that is smaller than the size ofthe 'udphdr' structure. This issue may lead to out-of-bounds read access orindirect host memory disclosure to the guest. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to data confidentiality. This flaw affects libslirpversions prior to 4.6.0.

criterions.comment: qemu package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
